data.name: Visage — Original Digital Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
A beautifully dark soundtrack for horror fans

This DLC contains the full original soundtrack of the psychological horror game Visage. It contains 98 minutes of ambient instrumental music ranging from soft melodies to darkly themed and disturbing music. It features a blend of piano, violin, guitar, and electronic drones to create a truly immersive ambiance that takes the listener to a beautifully melancholic mood.


The soundtrack files can be found in the following directory, under your Steam Library installation path.

> \\[%Steam Library Path%]\steamapps\common\Visage

Track list

Composed by Peter Wicher.


1. Premonitions (3:48)
2. A Better Place (1:44)
3. Cacophony (1:11)
4. Broken Smile (2:00)
5. The Devils Mouth (1:36)
6. Vagabond (3:20)
7. House of Doors (1:48)
8. Bells of the Underworld (1:36)
9. 9 (2:12)
10. You Are Not Safe (2:12)
11. Look Behind You (2:24)
12. Monster (0:55)
13. The Tree (1:48)
14. Alone (1:43)
15. Wander (1:30)
16. Madness (1:25)
17. Empty Headspace (1:33)
18. Anxiety (2:40)
19. Desolation (1:56)
20. In Darkness (2:36)
21. Photograph (2:40)
22. Memories (1:44)
23. The Breath (1:01)
24. Siniestra (2:01)
25. Melancholy (3:12)
26. Premonitions (Reprise) (2:44)
27. Premonitions (Other Side) (4:02)

BONUS Songs

1. Boiler (1:14)
2. Hollow Lullaby (2:24)
3. Bones (1:06)
4. Desperation (0:58)
5. Waiting Room From Hell (2:08)
6. 333 (2:06)
7. Blasphemy (2:56)
8. 062483 (4:00)
9. Demoniaca (1:36)
10. One Way Ticket (1:44)
11. Insanity (1:57)
12. I Must Be Losing My Mind (2:00)
13. Never Going Home (1:48)
14. A Monstrous Thing (2:08)
15. Oppression (1:48)
16. Phantom (1:52)
17. The Cry (2:24)
18. Window (1:36)
19. Sigil In Blood (1:32)
20. Zodiac (3:17)

data.short_description: This DLC contains the full original soundtrack of the psychological horror game Visage. It contains 98 minutes of ambient instrumental music ranging from soft melodies to darkly themed and disturbing music.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Ryzen™ 5
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 TI or AMD Radeon™ RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 or AMD Ryzen™ 7
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon™ RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
